Note: For other MSS see 4644; for the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 4649.
_description: Gospel for the Fourth Sunday in Lent in the Northern Homily Cycle

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Saint Iohn þe gud gospellerTelles þat I sall say you
                    her…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…That may yhe by a tall now hereThat I haue redy rymand
                    her

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Saynt Ion þe gude gospellereTelles þat I sall say
                    ȝow here…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…þat may ȝe be a tale now hereþat I haue redy
                    rynnand here
